publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-3146 Bristow Muldoon: Right Hon Robin Cook MPâ€”That the Parliament offers its condolences to the family and friends of the Right Hon Robin Cook MP following his untimely and sad death on 6 August 2005; recognises the major contribution made by Robin within the United Kingdom and internationally over decades as one of the most able parliamentarians of his generation, and acknowledges the dedicated service that he offered to his constituents in West Lothian. Supported by: Mike Pringle*, Jim Mather*, Fiona Hyslop*, David McLetchie*, Mr Duncan McNeil*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Iain Smith*, Bill Butler*, Karen Whitefield*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Nicola Sturgeon*, Robin Harper*, Sarah Boyack*, Derek Brownlee*, Paul Martin*, Brian Adam*, Margo MacDonald*, Maureen Macmillan*, Janis Hughes*, Mark Ballard*, Cathy Peattie*, Ms Wendy Alexander*, Scott Barrie*, Mr Alasdair Morrison*, Mike Watson*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Stewart Stevenson*, Nora Radcliffe*, Murdo Fraser*, Margaret Smith*, Patrick Harvie*, Chris Ballance*, Kate Maclean*, Mr Jim Wallace*, Elaine Smith*, Bruce Crawford*, Mr Mark Ruskell*, Christine May*, Jeremy Purvis*, Alex Neil*, Shiona Baird*, Margaret Jamieson*, Jackie Baillie*, John Home Robertson*, Mr Jamie McGrigor*, Margaret Mitchell*, Helen Eadie*, Marlyn Glen*, Mr David Davidson*, Mr George Reid*, Colin Fox*, Trish Godman*, Eleanor Scott*, Mr Ted Brocklebank*, Susan Deacon*, Mr John Swinney*, Des McNulty*, Dr Sylvia Jackson*, Gordon Jackson*, Peter Peacock*, Irene Oldfather*, Cathie Craigie*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Rob Gibson*, John Swinburne*

S2M-3146 Right Hon Robin Cook MP (lodged on 9 August 2005) Michael Matheson*, Richard Baker*, Phil Gallie*, Bill Aitken*, Euan Robson*, Mrs Mary Mulligan*, John Scott*, Linda Fabiani*, Michael McMahon*
S2M-3146 Right Hon Robin Cook MP (lodged on 9 August 2005) Karen Gillon*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-3146 Right Hon Robin Cook MP (lodged on 9 August 2005) Mr Brian Monteith*
